quote: There is one way of breathing that is shameful and constricted. Then, there's another way: a breath of love that takes you all the way to infinity.
author: Rumi

quote: If Your Eyes Are Opened, You'll See The Things Worth Seeing.
author: Rumi

quote: My impression of the American people can be summarized by a quotation from Benjamin Franklin, Those things that hurt instruct! I realized that people in this part of the world meet their problems head on. They attempt to get out of them rather than suffer them.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Life is balance of holding on and letting go.
author: Rumi

quote: Whatever purifies you is the right path, I will not try to define it.
author: Rumi
